com.activelook.activelooksdk

Interface Sdk


  • public interface Sdk
    Main entry point for the Active Look SDK. Every application must first get an instance of the SDK from here.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Sdk getInstance()
      Get the Active Look SDK instance.
      static Sdk init(android.content.Context applicationContext)
      Initialize the Active Look SDK with the associated context.
      boolean isScanning()
      Is it scanning.
      void startScan(androidx.core.util.Consumer<DiscoveredGlasses> onDiscoverGlasses)
      Enter scan mode for searching glasses.
      void stopScan()
      Quit scan mode.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        Initialize the Active Look SDK with the associated context.
        Parameters:
        applicationContext - The Application context
        Returns:
        The Active Look SDK instance

      • getInstance

        Get the Active Look SDK instance.

      • startScan

        void startScan(androidx.core.util.Consumer<DiscoveredGlasses> onDiscoverGlasses)
        Enter scan mode for searching glasses.
        Parameters:
        onDiscoverGlasses - The callback to call for each discovered glasses
